body.name: Mini Pocket Sticker Printer 13 Rolls Paper, Bluetooth Wireless Mini Thermal Printer for Phone iOS Android, Inkless Portable Print Pod for Notes Stickers Photos Pictures Gift for Kids (PK)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Funny Gifts】Mini Pocket Sticker Printer, can be used to print black and white photos, stickers, labels, notes, memos and etc. Thermal printing, only black white and gray, no need ink cartridge consumables, fast and clear printing. The mini printer sticker maker can print various drawings and cute patterns, play coloring games with children and cultivate their creativity.

【Bluetooth Connection】The mini pocket printer support wireless BT 4.0. Download with "Fun Print" app, compatible with Android and IOS cell phone to connect with inkless printer easily and quickly in seconds. The mini printer uses type-C fast charging with a rechargeable battery capacity of 1200 mAh, a long standby time for one charge.

【Compact and Portable】The sticker printer size 4.3L x 3.14W x 1.4H inch (11x8x3.5cm), weighs only 160g, is lightweight and portable, which can be tied with your favorite lanyard. You can put the mini wireless printer in your pocket directly and take it with you anytime anywhere. The pocket printer can accommodate a paper roll size of 57mmx30mm, and print the creative works you want with thermal paper, sticker label and more.

【Widely Use】Portable Mini Printer for printing study notes, storage label, fun sticker, To-do-list, picture, photo, work memo, shopping list, patterns to draw, QR code and others. It’s usual used at home, office, study, work, consume. A practical and cute gift set for boys and girls, kids, family, friends, student, teacher .

【Templates】APP "Fun Print" provides nearly 2000 pattern templates and also supports DIY your own template by using the patterns, supports printing of Word, Excel, PDF and PPT documents, as well as website printing and Text Scan. There are many pattern templates about Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Easter, and April Fool's Day. Follow the quick user manual and start creating unlimited creativity with the wireless pocket printer.

【What You Will Get】The package includes a mini thermal printer, 5 white thermal paper rolls, 3 colored thermal paper rolls, 5 sticky label paper rolls, 6 colored pens, a type-C power cord and a quick use manual.

【PAPRMA Customer Service】If you have any questions about our products, you can contact us at any time. We will provide friendly technical support, before and after-sales service to try the best to help every customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fun and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a fun machine, the app is super easy to use and it prints quickly. It's pretty pixelated, but fun none the less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: The Mrs bought it for herself and, honestly? It gets the job done. It does what the description says. Not 5 stars because I have seen the more expensive models, and their quality is clearly superior. However, for this price? It's a strong 4/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!
reviews.reviewText: I use this at work (school teacher) to label my student work, label supplies, label students, notebooks, and print custom stickers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is cute, but not terribly useful
reviews.reviewText: I had hoped we might be able to use this for printing some quick labels for boxes, totes, etc.It is not as easy to setup as I would like, I was able to get it working on my phone, but my wife was not.After getting it setup, I tested out the software to make some custom prints, and even tried printing a few images I had saved on my phone.So far, many the images are very low res, which is not terrible, but they are so faint, some details are completely washed out.It does make a difference if you are using the plain paper vs the sticker paper though, so keep that in mind.I wanted to be able to use it to print custom stickers for my kids, and printing on the sticker paper does produce better results, but the images need to have good contrast.Overall, I am not sorry I got it, but I would not recommend it.I guess as long as I can keep getting the sticker paper rolls, It will be used for custom stickers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Ok for photos
reviews.reviewText: App isn't the easiest if you want to do text. Its good for pictures. I kept it but its not the best. It will stop after printing 10 photos, gets too hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun!
reviews.reviewText: I love all the different papers included.I love to make stickers and this is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun To Use and Create With
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter who loves to take pictures, especially of animals. This printer is really easy to connect to the phone, in a minute or less. It comes with everything needed to start having fun with it right away. I did get her the pink version and it is absolutely adorable. It comes with a lot of paper which I am very grateful for because it means it will be a while before I have to order more.The Kit comes with a charging cord which is awesome and will save me money since I don't have to worry about batteries. It also comes with markers that add a little color to the printouts in black and white. One issue we've found is that the pictures do not tear off perfectly. Some were even ripped in half when trying to be extra careful. Now she uses scissors to cut them off and now they're all perfectly separated into their own pictures without them ripping apart. It is small enough for her to take it with her anytime she wants to go out and about. This is a wonderful pocket sticker printer set that we are all enjoying as she prints out her wonderful pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, fun and excellent quality and value.
reviews.reviewText: This is too much fun! Truthfully I am a bit addicted. I am truly impressed by the quality and ease of printing. I have been looking for a mini printer but so many lack quality or come with only 1 roll of paper. This kit comes with a variety (and plenty of it!) Of paper. One blue, one pink, 4 sticker rolls and 5 regular paper rolls. That is a wonderful bonus.Not only super cute, but it prints out images, photos and text beautifully. Amazing quality for being so compact and amazing value too.This is easy to use and installing the paper is simple.I have installed the app and printed pictures from their clip art vault (pic shown as examples), as well as my own photos and also images I downloaded from the Internet. All are wonderful considering the size and that this is thermal paper. My favorite thing to do is print out my son's favorite cartoon characters, and then we color them in and make them into bookmarks (laminating afterwards) or stick them in our scrapbook.The battery life seems to last for a while too. I have used it many, many times over the last 2 weeks, and only charged once so far.I honestly 100% think this is excellent value and would order again if I needed to, or gift as a present.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fun for my teen to use
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to set up, but you must use an app to use it. The print quality was decent. My teen has had fun using it.
The paper is just regular and the prints are low quality
